languages.text: "Я ценю то, что создала Теодора, и верю, что исчерпавшая себя ситуация — исключение в отлаженных механизмах корабля. Раз заведенные порядки работают — я не вижу причин их менять".

"I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."
languages.original_text: "Я ценю то, что создала Теодора, и верю, что исчерпавшая себя ситуация — исключение в отлаженных механизмах корабля. Раз заведенные порядки работают — я не вижу причин их менять".

traits.locale_text: "I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

"I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

"I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

"I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

languages.text: “我尊重西奥多拉定下来的规矩。这艘飞船一直都运行得很顺畅，至于目前的情况，我相信这仅仅是个特例而已。既然现有的规矩依然在发挥作用，我认为没必要改变它们。”
languages.original_text: "I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

traits.locale_text: “我尊重西奥多拉定下来的规矩。这艘飞船一直都运行得很顺畅，至于目前的情况，我相信这仅仅是个特例而已。既然现有的规矩依然在发挥作用，我认为没必要改变它们。”

languages.text: «Aprecio lo que ha creado Theodora y confío que esta situación es una aberración en las operaciones por lo demás fluidas de esta nave. Ya que los procedimientos establecidos funcionan, no veo la necesidad de cambiarlos».
languages.original_text: "I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

traits.locale_text: «Aprecio lo que ha creado Theodora y confío que esta situación es una aberración en las operaciones por lo demás fluidas de esta nave. Ya que los procedimientos establecidos funcionan, no veo la necesidad de cambiarlos».

languages.text: 「私はシオドーラが作り上げたものを評価しているし、今回の事態が船の順調な運行における異常事態であると思っている。確立された手順が機能している以上、それを変更する理由はない」
languages.original_text: "I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

traits.locale_text: 「私はシオドーラが作り上げたものを評価しているし、今回の事態が船の順調な運行における異常事態であると思っている。確立された手順が機能している以上、それを変更する理由はない」

languages.text: "Ich weiß zu schätzen, was Theodora erschaffen hat, und ich vertraue darauf, dass diese Situation eine Anomalie im ansonsten reibungslosen Betrieb des Schiffs ist. Da die etablierten Verfahren funktionieren, sehe ich keinen Grund, sie zu ändern."
languages.original_text: "I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß zu schätzen, was Theodora erschaffen hat, und ich vertraue darauf, dass diese Situation eine Anomalie im ansonsten reibungslosen Betrieb des Schiffs ist. Da die etablierten Verfahren funktionieren, sehe ich keinen Grund, sie zu ändern."

languages.text: « J'ai le plus grand respect pour ce que Théodora a créé et je veux bien croire que la situation actuelle est l'exception qui confirme la bonne gestion de ce vaisseau. Puisque les protocoles établis ont fait leurs preuves, je ne vois pas de raison d'en changer. »
languages.original_text: "I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai le plus grand respect pour ce que Théodora a créé et je veux bien croire que la situation actuelle est l'exception qui confirme la bonne gestion de ce vaisseau. Puisque les protocoles établis ont fait leurs preuves, je ne vois pas de raison d'en changer. »

languages.text: "Theodora'nın mirasına değer veriyorum. Bu sapkı haricinde gemide her şeyin sorunsuz işlediğine de şüphem yok. Kurulu düzen bozulmadığına göre düzeni değiştirmeye gerek görmüyorum."
languages.original_text: "I value what Theodora created and I trust that this situation is an aberration in the ship's otherwise smooth operation. Since the established procedures are working, I see no reason to change them."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora'nın mirasına değer veriyorum. Bu tatsızlık haricinde geminin sorunsuz işlediğine de şüphem yok. Kurulu düzen çalıştığına göre düzeni değiştirmeye gerek görmüyorum."
